explanation: [0-0] There is a basin of sand on the ground.

[0-8] Then a hand places a hoe into the sand and presses it down with an iron rod. Afterwards, two hands lift the hoe out. Next, one hand uses a rubber mallet to hammer the top of the hoe-shaped sand, and then one hand places a red and white container into the groove above the sand and presses it down with an iron rod. Following that, two hands use an iron rod and a piece of iron to hammer into the bottom of the hoe-shaped sand.
